sentences.en: After all, it can be quite discouraging to be at the bottom of the top grade!
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 在好班但排名在最后也会令人感到灰心丧气!

sentences.en: But on the long run, dropping important items may be discouraging.
sentences.cn: 但是在远途奔跑中, 丢失重要物品会让人气馁的.

sentences.en: Did you ever hear of such a discouraging series of events?
sentences.cn: 有谁听说过这么一连串叫人丧气的事 吗 ?

sentences.en: In Spain and Italy privileged workers are protected discouraging new permanent jobs.
sentences.cn: 在西班牙和意大利,优待的工人受到保护,导致新固定工作的减少.

sentences.en: In this discouraging Situation, workmen were willing to work overseas for higher wages.
sentences.cn: 在这种令人沮丧的形势下, 工人们愿意出国做工去挣大钱.

sentences.en: It could be exhilarating, intimidating, sometimes even discouraging, but always challenging.
sentences.cn: 哈佛的生活使人兴奋, 让人胆怯, 有时甚至会感到泄气, 但永远充满了挑战.

sentences.en: It is very discouraging to be sneered at all the time.
sentences.cn: 总被人嘲笑是很让人灰心的.
艾莱柯, 这可太让人扫兴了!

sentences.en: It's discouraging that so many students have failed.
sentences.cn: 那么多学生考不及格,真令人泄气.

sentences.en: It's very discouraging to be sneered at all the time.
sentences.cn: 成天受嘲讽是很令人泄气的.

sentences.en: It's very discouraging to be sneered at all time.
sentences.cn: 总是受到讥笑使人非常气馁.

sentences.en: One's resolution is one's prophecy, leave all discouraging and pessimism behind.
sentences.cn: 我们的决心是一种预言, 它将所有的不如意和悲观泡在脑后.

sentences.en: Research for improvement of chestnut has been discouraging and encouraging.
sentences.cn: 栗树改良的研究工作曾令人失望又曾使人鼓舞.

sentences.en: Today's report is rather more discouraging for the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天的报道让人对经济更加丧失了信心。

sentences.en: You cannot bring about prosperity by discouraging thrift.
sentences.cn: 不提倡勤俭节约就不会有繁盛.
